title: Clickjacking In https://demo.nextcloud.com
content:

steps: Create an HTML file with an iframe pointing to https://demo.nextcloud.com
Open the HTML file in a browser to observe the iframe loading the vulnerable page
vuln_description: The vulnerability is a clickjacking issue where the demo.nextcloud.com site can be embedded in an iframe, allowing potential UI redressing attacks. This occurs because the site lacks proper X-Frame-Options or Content-Security-Policy headers to prevent framing.
reason: This vulnerability is trivial to discover as it only requires basic HTML knowledge to create an iframe test page. No complex interactions, state manipulation, or novel logic is involved.
